content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "list_files" command to check my directory for necessary files. I found "brno_reservoir_trail.py" and "alltrails_data.txt". I then tried to execute "brno_reservoir_trail.py" using the "execute_python_file" command, but it returned an error due to an attribute error in the code. I used the "read_file" command to read the "alltrails_data.txt" file and obtained information about the trail. I then used the "execute_shell" command to run the "pip install" command, but it failed because it could not find the "requirements.txt" file. I used the "execute_shell" command again to run the "pip install" command with the necessary dependencies to run the "brno_reservoir_trail.py" file successfully.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "pip install -r requirements.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\'\nSTDERR:\nb"ERROR: Could not open requirements file: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: \'requirements.txt\'\\n"', type='action_result')]
"""
